mapper.select: SELECT company.company_id as companyID FROM Company company, Users user WHERE company.company_id=user.company_id AND user.user_id = #{userID};
SELECT board_id as boardID, company_id as companyID, board_name as boardName FROM Board WHERE company_id=#{companyID};
SELECT board_id as boardID, company_id as companyID, board_name as boardName FROM Board WHERE board_name=#{boardName};

SELECT post.post_id as postID, post.user_id as userID, user.user_name as userName, post.board_id as boardID, post.company_id as companyID, post.post_title as postTitle, post.post_content as postContent, post.post_register_time as postRegisterTime FROM Post post, Users user WHERE post.user_id = user.user_id AND post.board_id=#{boardID} ORDER BY post.post_id DESC;

SELECT post.post_id as postID, post.user_id as userID, user.user_name as userName, post.board_id as boardID, post.company_id as companyID, post.post_title as postTitle, post.post_content as postContent, post.post_register_time as postRegisterTime FROM Post post, Users user WHERE post.user_id = user.user_id AND post.post_id=#{postID}
